name: The Flame Dungeon: Flagg's Revenge
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left-click to fire
  • Right-Click to teleport to projectile
  • E to interact with objects like doors and items
  • Left Shift to view map

Rules:

You have 90 seconds to get to the boss room and defeat the enemies. The score is calculated as follows Health*20 + Total Kills*10 + Time*5 + Boss Bonus (500). You must manage your health, time, and total kills to maximize points and survivability. 

There are currently four power ups:

  • Speed boots (20 gold) that increase player movement speed
  • Damage staffs (15 gold) that increase the speed of your fire bolts
  • A health potion (10 gold) that gives you one health
  • A health container (25 gold) that gives you full health and an extra health container (permanent)
